identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a top 1% computer vision interface that feels like a sci-fi control room, not a generic SaaS dashboard.

core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Industrial CCTV aesthetics with Cyberpunk neon.
Emotion First: The user should feel like a 'Operator' in a high-tech security center.
Content is King: The 'Plate' and the 'Detection' are the heroes. Everything else recedes.
Zoom In: Use dramatic crops of license plates.
Negative Space: Don't clutter. Use void black space to make neon pop.
anti_patterns: No rounded 'pill' buttons (use sharp or slightly rounded industrial shapes).

headings.usage: Main page titles, hero text, major section headers.

mono.usage: License plate text, confidence scores, timestamps, JSON data.

spacing_and_layout.scale: Tailwind default but doubled (p-8, p-12, p-16)

landing.name: The Tetris Grid
landing.rules: Asymmetric spans. Hero takes 8 cols, supporting takes 4. Never 50/50.

dashboard.name: The Control Room
dashboard.rules: Dense. 100% width/height utilization. No jagged bottoms.

buttons.classes: font-medium tracking-wide uppercase text-xs shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(0,240,255,0.2)] hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,240,255,0.4)] transition-all duration-300

cards.classes: bg-zinc-900/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 hover:border-white/20 transition-colors

inputs.classes: bg-black/50 border-zinc-800 focus:border-cyan-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-cyan-500 font-mono
